snippet.title: PSX Longplay [559] Ridge Racer Bonus Turbo Mode Disc [US]
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

Ridge Racer Bonus Turbo Mode Disc was released by Namco in 1999 and was a free bonus addition to the game Ridge Racer Type 4. This is the US 60fps release. I have previously recorded Ridge Racer Hi-Spec Demo which was the 50fps Pal release.

The game is an improved version of the original ridge racer release utilising an updated hi res engine using knowledge gained throughout the years of developing on PlayStation. The game uses interlaced mode which the emu doesn't handle that well and traditional tv broadcast de-interlacers do not work that well either. I have made a blended version of the video to hide the combing effect at the cost of image sharpness. This version is in 60fps but the extra performance comes at the cost of a vertical resolution of 456 where as the 50 fps pal version used a vertical resolution of 512.

I start the video by showing a demo of the original ridge racer. I then load Turbo mode and show the background information on how this demo came into existence (Pause video if pages skip to fast). Then its onto the game.

00:00:00 Dual in the original Ridge Racer

00:05:22 Ridge Racer History and Info

00:07:12 Ridge Racer Turbo. Time Attack Short, Time trial Short, Time Attack Long, Time Trial Long. With this mode complete, I can now go after the special cars.

00:25:55 Ridge Racer Turbo. Time Trial Short Extra, Time Attack Short Extra.

00:41:40 Time Trial Long Extra. I beat and unlock White Angel Car #0 here to unlock it and play Time Attack Long Extra.

00:44:43 I go back to Time Trial Long to dual against Racing Car #13.

00:49:08 One last go on Time Trial Short just to show Car #13 being used. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
